item.title: Timothée Chalamet Introduces Gwyneth Paltrow to High-Stakes Ping-Pong in ‘Marty Supreme’ Trailer
item.description: Tyler, the Creator and Fran Drescher also star in Josh Safdie’s feature that hits theaters later this year from A24.

item.title: ‘Happy Gilmore 2’ Review: Adam Sandler’s Netflix Sequel Is Terrible — and Fans Will Love It
item.description: The golfer with anger management issues returns in this belated, cameo-laden follow-up to the cult comedy.
